document.full_text: actress and goodwill ambassador angelina jolie appealed on tuesday for international support for people fleeing the conflict in libya and for increased aid for those inside the country.
document.title: angelina jolie says people fleeing libya need support
lines_and_colors: actress and goodwill ambassador angelina jolie appealed on tuesday for international support for people fleeing the conflict in libya and for increased aid for those inside the country.
